thread.title: K. McMillan

author: K. McMillan
title: K. McMillan
text: My experience with Promo Direct was very positive. My rep Becky was focused on trying to find the best solution for our last minute order, which needed to be placed for a tradeshow just over one week away. She helped me focus my energy towards getting the logo placement approved by our company, and she had our products shipped so that they arrived one day before expected. I would absolutely work with Promo Direct again!
